mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KSA_BD_CURRENCY_RATE_BYDATE ( ID, CURRENCY_ID, MONTH, RATE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{month,jdbcType=DATE}, #{rate} )
INSERT INTO KSA_BD_CURRENCY_RATE_BYPARTNER ( ID, CURRENCY_ID, PARTNER_ID, RATE ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{currency.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partner.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rate} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.ID, r.RATE, r.MONTH, r.CURRENCY_ID, d.CODE as CURRENCY_CODE, d.NAME as CURRENCY_NAME, d.EXTRA as CURRENCY_RATE FROM KSA_BD_CURRENCY_RATE_BYDATE r JOIN KSA_BD_DATA d ON r.CURRENCY_ID = d.ID WHERE r.Id = #{id}

SELECT r.ID, r.RATE, r.MONTH, r.CURRENCY_ID, d.CODE as CURRENCY_CODE, d.NAME as CURRENCY_NAME, d.EXTRA as CURRENCY_RATE FROM KSA_BD_CURRENCY_RATE_BYDATE r JOIN KSA_BD_DATA d ON r.CURRENCY_ID = d.ID ORDER BY r.MONTH DESC

SELECT r.ID, r.RATE, r.CURRENCY_ID, d.CODE as CURRENCY_CODE, d.NAME as CURRENCY_NAME, d.EXTRA as CURRENCY_RATE, r.PARTNER_ID, c.CODE as PARTNER_CODE, c.NAME as PARTNER_NAME FROM KSA_BD_CURRENCY_RATE_BYPARTNER r JOIN KSA_BD_DATA d ON r.CURRENCY_ID = d.ID JOIN KSA_BD_PARTNER c ON r.PARTNER_ID = c.ID WHERE r.Id = #{id}
